dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3573538T] copyright infringement and defamation of character
dmca.body: To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: karl@karljkaul.com [mailto:karl@karljkaul.com] Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2007 8:46 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3573538T] copyright infringement and defamation of character ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. copyright infringement and defamation of character Added by system at Wednesday, Mar 21 2007 01:38 pm X-MailFrom: karl@karljkaul.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Mar 21 13:38:28 2007 Received: (qmail 29319 invoked by alias); 21 Mar 2007 18:38:28 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 29316 invoked from network); 21 Mar 2007 18:38:27 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 12:38:23 -0600 (CST) Received: from host-84-9-53-207.bulldogdsl.com ([84.9.53.207]:65526 helo=[192.168.0.4]) by zencphosting03.zen.co.uk with esmtpa (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from ) id 1HU5hF-0001mN-W5 for abuse@ev1servers.net; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 18:38:06 +0000 Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.3) To: abuse@ev1servers.net Message-Id: Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=Apple-Mail-24-774072361 From: "Karl J. Kaul" X-ASG-Orig-Subj: copyright infringement and defamation of character Subject: copyright infringement and defamation of character Date: Wed, 21 Mar 2007 18:38:04 +0000 X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.3) X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - zencphosting03.zen.co.uk X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - ev1servers.net X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - karljkaul.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: karl@karljkaul.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 21 Mar 2007 18:38:24.0867 (UTC) FILETIME=[1BF05B30:01C76BE8] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern, I am writing to ask you to disconnect one of your clients due to abuse on there part. I am wondering what process I have to go through to get them shut down. These people, if I can call them that, on the first issue have taken some of my copyrighted images and used them without consent and when asked to remove them went on to defamate me and the people in my work and make threats against me. Please feel free to view the forum for yourself at http://www.pesgaming.com/showthread.php?t=48466 the said offenders site info is : Registrar: ENOM, INC. Nameservers: NS.SOCCERGAMING.COM, NS2.SOCCERGAMING.COM Status: Locked Created: 11 Oct 2006 06:11:00 Expires: 11 Oct 2007 06:11:00 IP Address: 67.15.113.7 (ev1s-67-15-113-7.ev1servers.net) Whois results from whois.enom.com: =-=-=-= Visit AboutUs.org for more information about pesgaming.com AboutUs: pesgaming.com Registration Service Provided By: NameCheap.com Contact: support@NameCheap.com Domain name: pesgaming.com Registrant Contact: PES2 Peter Willis (hitmanuk2k@aol.com) +44.07814653668 Fax: +1.5555555555 15 Albert Terrace, Billy Row, Crook, Durham, England DL15 9SU GB Administrative Contact: PES2 Peter Willis (hitmanuk2k@aol.com) +44.07814653668 Fax: +1.5555555555 15 Albert Terrace, Billy Row, Crook, Durham, England DL15 9SU GB Technical Contact: PES2 Peter Willis (hitmanuk2k@aol.com) +44.07814653668 Fax: +1.5555555555 15 Albert Terrace, Billy Row, Crook, Durham, England DL15 9SU GB Status: Locked Name Servers: ns.soccergaming.com ns2.soccergaming.com Creation date: 11 Oct 2006 06:11:00 Expiration date: 11 Oct 2007 06:11:00 =-=-=-= Please let me know if you intend to do anything. Regards, kjk Karl J. Kaul Photographer http://www.karljkaul.com +44(0) 7776131115
